trans-unit.source: Represents a response from WCF Data Services that contains binary data as a stream.
Gets the <see langword="Content-Disposition" /> header field for the response stream.
The contents of the <see langword="Content-Disposition" /> header field.
When the `Content-Disposition` header is not present in the response, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 当`Content-Disposition`标头不在响应中，存在<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A>属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the response stream.
The content type of the response stream.
When the `Content-Type` header is not present in the response, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 当`Content-Type`标头不在响应中，存在<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.ContentDisposition%2A>属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse" /> class.
Call the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method when you have finished using the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>.
trans-unit.target: 使用完 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> 后调用 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This releases resources held by the object.
trans-unit.target: 此释放资源由对象拥有。

trans-unit.source: You should always do this to release the resources held by the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse>; otherwise, the consumed resources will not be released until after the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> object.
trans-unit.target: 您应始终执行这一操作来释放由 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> 保留的资源；否则，将不会在垃圾收集器调用 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 对象上的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> 方法之前释放已消耗的资源。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method is called and all references to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> are released, the memory used can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> 方法并释放 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> 的所有引用后，可以通过垃圾回收回收使用的内存。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> after calling the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不能在调用 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> 方法后使用 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of headers from the response.
The headers collection from the response message as a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 响应消息中作为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" /> 对象的标头集合。

trans-unit.source: The response is a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> object that contains key-value pairs of strings for each header in the response.
trans-unit.target: 响应是包含响应中各标头的字符串的关键值对的 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binary property data from the data service as a binary stream.
The stream that contains the binary property data.
trans-unit.target: 包含二进制属性数据的流。

trans-unit.source: When a network errors occurs while reading from this stream, an error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在读取此流发生网络错误时引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.Stream> is read-only.

You must call either the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> or the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method on the <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 您必须调用 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse.Dispose%2A> 上的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse> 方法或者 <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> 上的 <xref:System.IO.Stream> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the network connection remains open and unavailable to other applications.
trans-unit.target: 否则，网络连接将保持打开，但不可用于其他应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method is used to access the stream.
When the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceStreamResponse" /> is already disposed.
